subheading: Kallet is a free, client-side interface helping you interact with the Kaleidochain. Our easy-to-use, open-source platform allows you to generate wallets, interact with smart contracts, and so much more.
obtainAddress: Obtain an Kaleidochain address and generate your private key. Saving and safekeeping the key will be your responsibility.
accessMyWalletDesc: Send or swap your KAL and tokens, interact with smart contracts, and more! This is where the magic happens.
aboutSubheading: Kallet是基于MyEtherWallet项目二次开发的一款开源、离线安全、支持多种方式的网页轻钱包,它能非常便捷使用以太坊系列钱包管理Kaleidochain或其他以太坊区块链上的资产和代币.
aboutMewWalletDesc: Access the Kaleidochain's original and most-trusted wallet client, now with a host of new features all contained in an elegant, easy-to-use interface.
aboutHardwareWalletDesc: Kallet offers support for all major hardware wallets including Ledger, Trezor, and many more.
aboutSwapDesc: Kallet has partnered with Bity, Kyber Network, Changelly, and Simplex to allow users to swap fiat to crypto, ETH and BTC, ETH and ERC-20.
aboutMewConnectDesc: Kallet's companion app brings hardware-wallet style security to your iOS or Android smartphone, helping you to secure your funds as never before.
faqsSubheading: 没有找到你想要的问题？
socialSubheading: Get in the know and see your balance grow (we hope)!
howToCreateWalletDesc: Kallet 提供三种方式创建以太坊系列账户,、Keystore 文件(以太坊原生钱包), 或助记词.更多信息, 点击
whatIsMewConnectDesc: KALconnect 是Kallet伴生的手机端硬件钱包,我们提供了安卓和苹果两个版本!下载点击
workingWOtherWalletsTitle: Kallet 能使用哪些类型钱包?
workingWOtherWalletsDesc: Kallet 支持多种钱包使用,硬件钱包如,the Ledger Nano S 或 Trezor,以及第三方钱包MetaMask等. 我们开放了协议允许开发者开发自己的钱包.更多信息,点击
howToSendTxDesc: 任何有KAL或其他代币的账户都可以免费使用 Kallet 发送交易,区块链本身会收取一定gas作为交易手续费,我们建议账户至少持有 0.01 KAL,大概能支付2-3笔交易手续费.更多点击
forgotPasswordPrivKeyTitle: 忘记钱包密码或私钥,如何找回?
forgotPasswordPrivKeyDesc: Kallet 不持久化保存账户,无法提供密码/私钥找回功能,我们强烈建议用户使用笔记本记录,并妥善保管.更多使用注意事项,点击
welcomeToV5Desc1: Welcome to the brand new Kallet! If this is your first time visiting, check out our {0}.
welcomeToV5Desc2: Vintage Kallet can still be accessed {0}.
